mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM( SELECT * FROM(SELECT t.id,u.logo_path AS logoPath,t.item_name AS itemName,t.tag_value AS tagvalue,u.sex,t.sort, (CASE WHEN t.teacher_level='预备级' THEN 0.5 WHEN t.teacher_level='1 星级' THEN 1 WHEN t.teacher_level='2 星级' THEN 2 WHEN t.teacher_level='3 星级' THEN 3 WHEN t.teacher_level='4 星级' THEN 4 WHEN t.teacher_level='5 星级' THEN 5 WHEN t.teacher_level='6 星级' THEN 6 END) AS teacherLevel,u.city, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM app_teacher_order o WHERE o.teacher_id=t.id AND state=4) AS counts, ROUND(6378.138*2*ASIN(SQRT(POW(SIN( (u.latitude*PI()/180-#{latitude}*PI()/180)/2),2)+COS(u.latitude*PI()/180)*COS(#{latitude}*PI()/180)* POW(SIN( (u.longitude*PI()/180-#{longitude}*PI()/180)/2),2))),2) AS distance, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM app_teacher_collection c WHERE c.teacher_id=t.id AND c.data_type=1 AND c.uid=#{uid}) AS isCollect, u.longitude,u.latitude FROM app_teacher t INNER JOIN sys_user u ON u.id=t.uid AND u.city=#{city} WHERE t.record_type=2 ORDER BY distance)as b
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM(SELECT t.id,u.logo_path AS logoPath,t.item_name AS itemName,t.tag_value AS tagvalue,u.sex,t.sort, (CASE WHEN t.teacher_level='预备级' THEN 0.5 WHEN t.teacher_level='1 星级' THEN 1 WHEN t.teacher_level='2 星级' THEN 2 WHEN t.teacher_level='3 星级' THEN 3 WHEN t.teacher_level='4 星级' THEN 4 WHEN t.teacher_level='5 星级' THEN 5 WHEN t.teacher_level='6 星级' THEN 6 END) AS teacherLevel,u.city, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM app_teacher_order o WHERE o.teacher_id=t.id AND state=4) AS counts, ROUND(6378.138*2*ASIN(SQRT(POW(SIN( (u.latitude*PI()/180-#{latitude}*PI()/180)/2),2)+COS(u.latitude*PI()/180)*COS(#{latitude}*PI()/180)* POW(SIN( (u.longitude*PI()/180-#{longitude}*PI()/180)/2),2))),2) AS distance, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM app_teacher_collection c WHERE c.teacher_id=t.id AND c.data_type=1 AND c.uid=#{uid}) AS isCollect, u.longitude,u.latitude FROM app_teacher t INNER JOIN sys_user u ON u.id=t.uid WHERE t.record_type=2 AND (u.city != #{city} OR u.city IS NULL) ORDER BY distance)as c ) AS a
and a.sex = #{sex}
and a.tagValue like '%${tagValue}%'
and a.itemName like '%${itemName}%'
and
a.teacherLevel = 0.5
a.teacherLevel in ('1 星级','2 星级')
a.teacherLevel in ('3 星级','4 星级')
a.teacherLevel in ('5 星级','6 星级')
order by a.sort desc LIMIT #{page},#{rows}

SELECT atr.logo_path AS logoPath,atr.id AS accompanyId, atr.item_name AS itemName,atr.tag_value AS tagValue,su.sex,su.city, (CASE WHEN atr.teacher_level='预备级' THEN 0.5 WHEN atr.teacher_level='1 星级' THEN 1 WHEN atr.teacher_level='2 星级' THEN 2 WHEN atr.teacher_level='3 星级' THEN 3 WHEN atr.teacher_level='4 星级' THEN 4 WHEN atr.teacher_level='5 星级' THEN 5 WHEN atr.teacher_level='6 星级' THEN 6 END) AS star,COUNT(ato.id) AS amount, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM app_teacher_collection c WHERE c.teacher_id=atr.id AND c.data_type=1 AND c.uid=#{uid}) AS isCollect, IFNULL(ROUND(6378.138*2*ASIN(SQRT(POW(SIN( (#{latitude}*PI()/180-su.latitude*PI()/180)/2),2)+COS(#{latitude}*PI()/180)*COS(su.latitude*PI()/180)* POW(SIN( (#{longitude}*PI()/180-su.longitude*PI()/180)/2),2))),2),0) AS distance FROM app_teacher AS atr INNER JOIN sys_user AS su ON atr.uid = su.id LEFT JOIN app_teacher_order AS ato ON atr.id = ato.teacher_id WHERE atr.record_type = 2 AND su.city LIKE '${city}%' AND atr.is_home = 1 GROUP BY atr.id LIMIT 0,3
SELECT t.id,t.item_name AS `text` FROM app_teacher t WHERE t.record_type=#{recordType}

SELECT t.id,t.logo_path AS logoPath,t.item_name AS itemName,t.item_content AS itemContent,t.item_remark AS itemRemark,t.sort, t.item_theme AS itemTheme,t.teacher_level AS teacherLevel,t.tag_type AS tagType,t.tag_value AS tagValue,CAST(t.create_time AS CHAR) AS createTime, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(td.tag_value) FROM app_teacher_district td WHERE td.teacher_id=t.id) AS district,t.uid as uid,u.user_name AS userName FROM app_teacher t LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id=t.uid where t.id = #{id}
mapper.sql: id, logo_path, uid, teacher_level, item_name, item_remark, item_theme, record_type, tag_value, tag_type, sort, is_home, create_time
mapper.update:
update app_teacher
logo_path = #{logoPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
teacher_level = #{teacherLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
item_name = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
item_remark = #{itemRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
item_theme = #{itemTheme,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
record_type = #{recordType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tag_value = #{tagValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tag_type = #{tagType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_home = #{isHome,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
item_content = #{itemContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
insert into app_teacher
logo_path,
uid,
teacher_level,
item_name,
item_remark,
item_theme,
record_type,
tag_value,
tag_type,
sort,
is_home,
create_time,
item_content,

mapper.update: update app_teacher set logo_path = #{logoPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uid = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, teacher_level = #{teacherLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_name = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_remark = #{itemRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_theme = #{itemTheme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, record_type = #{recordType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tag_value = #{tagValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tag_type = #{tagType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_home = #{isHome,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, item_content = #{itemContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
insert into app_teacher (logo_path, uid, teacher_level, item_name, item_remark, item_theme, record_type, tag_value, tag_type, sort, is_home, create_time, item_content) values
(#{item.logoPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.teacherLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.itemRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.itemTheme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.recordType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.tagValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tagType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.isHome,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.itemContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.delete:
delete from app_teacher where id in
#{item}
